verbs.description: Donald Trump ’s White House [V: is] undermining the international system for detecting illicit nuclear activity just as he may be about to need it .

Donald Trump ’s White House is undermining the international system for detecting illicit nuclear activity just as he [V: may] be about to need it .
Donald Trump ’s White House is undermining the international system for detecting illicit nuclear activity just as [ARG1: he] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: be] [ARG2: about to need it] .
Donald Trump ’s White House is undermining the international system for detecting illicit nuclear activity just as [ARG0: he] may be about to [V: need] [ARG1: it] .
